text:
Assignment 3 involves working with lambdas. I've you have never used these before, here are a couple tutorials you may find helpful:

<http://www.oracle.com/webfolder/technetwork/tutorials/obe/java/Lambda-QuickStart/index.html>

<https://medium.freecodecamp.org/learn-these-4-things-and-working-with-lambda-expressions-b0ab36e0fffc>

attachments.title: How to start working with Lambda Expressions in Java
attachments.text: Before Lambda expressions support was added by JDK 8, Iâ€™d only used examples of them in languages like C# and C++.
